
# Fields Needed for Notion Integration

## From lyndb25 (Global Project Database)
- Project Name = Navn
- Project Manager = Prosjektleder
- Customer ID = Kunde
- MVA Rate = MVA

## From Customer Database
- Name = Kundenavn
- Organization Number = Org.nr.
- Email = E-post
- Customer Project Manager = Kontaktperson

## From timef√∏ring Database (Time Entries)
- Description = Beskrivelse
- Unit Price = Veil timespris
- Discount = Rabatt (%)
- Quantity = Timer
- Total price = Totalt
- Date = Dato

## From utstyrsleie Database (Equipment Entries)
- Description = Utstyr
- Unit Price = Pris (veil)
- Discount = Rabatt
- Days used = Bruksdager
- Quantity = Antall
